alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 4:41AM EST until January 17 at 5:16AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Lexington, Richland and Calhoun Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Kershaw, Fairfield and Lancaster Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Congaree River at Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:33 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 116.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 115.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:33 AM EST Tuesday was 119.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 111.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 445 PM EST.
